snippet.title: Million Dollar Fish comp launched again
snippet.content: THE Million Dollar Fish competition has officially been launched for a third season. A total of 101 barramundi will be tagged and released into Territory waterways over the next few months. Of those, 100 will be worth $10,000 and one with be worth $1 million. Australian ricket legend Matthew Hayden is the ambassador for the event and said he was excited to get out on to the NT waterways. "Where won't I be fishing," he said. He said it was a great Australian pastime and everyone should get involved. Registrations are now open. To register, visit www.milliondollarfish.com.au
